summary: Core frontend flows (II sign-in, portfolio/badge detail, employer verify, issuer mint UI) and a backend badge model with mint/verify/list methods were added. However, backend persistence/stable storage and the constraint to keep all backend logic in backend/main.mo (no extra backend modules) are not clearly satisfied, and several unrequested features (user profiles, secret-token admin initialization, extra endpoints) were introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Badges are stored persistently in the single Motoko actor (survive canister upgrades using stable variables or upgrade hooks).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows in-memory Maps and a mutable counter, but no stable variables and no preupgrade/postupgrade hooks to persist/restore state across upgrades.

missing_requirements.requirement: Manage issuer permissions (who is allowed to mint), with safe defaults suitable for an MVP (e.g., canister controller/admin is initial issuer).
missing_requirements.reason: Minting is restricted to 'admin' but the diff does not show initialization of an initial admin/issuer based on canister controller or any explicit issuer management methods (add/remove issuer). It relies on access-control initialization that is not defined in the shown file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Student Portfolio Wallet UI allows a signed-in student to view, filter, and open details for their skill badges.
missing_requirements.reason: Badge list and detail components/hooks exist, but the StudentPortfolioPage implementation is not included in the provided diff summary, so filtering capability cannot be confirmed from evidence shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images exist at frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references generated asset paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files added under frontend/public/assets/generated (they may be among omitted binary/non-LLM-readable files). Existence cannot be verified from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile system (get/save user profiles) gated by a '#user' permission.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request user profiles (name/email/organization) or profile setup flows.

hallucinated_features.description: Secret URL parameter-based admin/access-control initialization (caffeineAdminToken) invoked from the frontend actor setup.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention secret tokens, initializing admin via URL params, or any non-II mechanism for privilege bootstrapping.

hallucinated_features.description: Public endpoint to fetch all badges (getAllBadges).
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements only call for listing badges by owner and fetching by id for verification; listing all badges publicly is not requested.
